author: Gonçalo de Sousa Monteiro
description: The flavour of the overproof rum greatly adds to the character of this Old Fashioned. There are many rum Old Fashioned riffs but this is the recipe that made this cocktail both special and famous.
name: Rum Old Fashioned
recipeIngredient: 50 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
2.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice)
